description:
11.126 hstack
Stack input videos horizontally.

All streams must be of same pixel format and of same height.

Note that this filter is faster than using overlay and pad filter
to create same output.

The filter accepts the following option:

inputs.description: Set number of input streams. Default is 2.

shortest.description: If set to 1, force the output to terminate when the shortest input terminates. Default value is 0.

name: hstack

parameters.description: Set number of input streams. Default is 2.
parameters.name: inputs

parameters.description: If set to 1, force the output to terminate when the shortest input terminates. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: shortest
